div.p:
Narrator:
Remember, there are 5 steps to set a plan for successfully achieving a goal. 1, set a date. 2, Make a public statement of intent. 3, identify alternatives. 4, Plan for obstacles. And 5, identify support around you. Look at your timeline again, and pick one goal to work with in more detail. The questions that follow will help yo udevelop a plan to achieve that goal.
